title: Static Gk
author: Bharat Kumar
description: Static GK (General Knowledge) includes facts that are unlikely to change over time, such as historical events, geography, books & authors, important organizations, and Indian polity. It is crucial for competitive exams like UPSC, SSC, and state-level exams.

title: Node Js
author: Bharat Kumar
description: Node.js is a powerful, open-source runtime environment that allows JavaScript to run on the server side. Built on Chrome's V8 engine, it enables fast, event-driven, and scalable network applications. It's widely used for building APIs, web apps, and real-time services.

title: Phrasal Verbs
author: Bharat Kumar
description: A phrasal verb is a combination of a verb and one or more particles (like prepositions or adverbs) that together create a new meaning. The meaning often differs from the individual words. Phrasal verbs are commonly used in everyday English and can be tricky for learners.

title: World Geography
author: Bharat Kumar
description: World geography is the study of the Earth's physical features and the human societies spread across it. It explores the relationships between people, places, and environments.
